Song.title: Oh What Grace
Song.copyright: Zach Jones 2005 Sovereign Grace Worship (Admin. by Integrity's Hosanna! Music)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [D]Come and let us lift our [D/F#M]voices let us sing a[G2]new Of His redeeming [ASUS]grace [A] [D]Come with hearts so full of [D/F#]wonder Let us shout for [G]joy For He's washed our sins a[ASUS]way [A] Yes [EM7]He has [G]saved our [ASUS]souls [A] And [EM7]of His [G]grace we'll s[C2]ing
Chorus: His [D]grace has pardoned [D/F#M]our transgressions His [G2]grace so [D/F#]marvelous so [EM7]free [G]His [D]grace has paid our [BM7]debt completely His [EM7]grace is [D/F#]all we'll ever n[G2]eed [ASUS] Oh what grace
{new_page} Verse 2: [D]Once we stood before Him [D/F#]guilty Condemned by all our [G2]sin Deserving of His [ASUS]wrath But [D]God so very rich in [D/F#]mercy lavished on us [G2]grace Through His Son's atoning [ASUS]death [A] And [EM7]He has [G]saved our [ASUS]souls [A] And [EM7]of His [G]grace we'll [C2]sing
Chorus: His [D]grace has pardoned [D/F#M]our transgressions His [G2]grace so [D/F#]marvelous so [EM7]free [G]His [D]grace has paid our [BM7]debt completely His [EM7]grace is [D/F#]all we'll ever n[G2]eed [ASUS] Oh what gr[| D/F# G | A EM | D/F# G | A EM | D/F# G | A EM | C |]ace
Bridge: [EM7 |] And we could never [D/F#]add To the finished work of [G2]Christ It will always be [ASUS]enough [A] [EM7 |] So it's here we'll rest our h[D/F#]earts And it's here we'll find our [G2]peace In His perfect righteous[ASUS]ness [A]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 come and let us lift our voices let us sing anew of his redeeming grace come with hearts so full of wonder let us shout for joy for hes washed our sins away yes he has saved our souls and of his grace well sing chorus his grace has pardoned our transgressions his grace so marvelous so free his grace has paid our debt completely his grace is all well ever need oh what grace verse 2 once we stood before him guilty condemned by all our sin deserving of his wrath but god so very rich in mercy lavished on us grace through his sons atoning death and he has saved our souls and of his grace well sing chorus his grace has pardoned our transgressions his grace so marvelous so free his grace has paid our debt completely his grace is all well ever need oh what grace bridge and we could never add to the finished work of christ it will always be enough so its here well rest our hearts and its here well find our peace in his perfect righteousness

Chorus: His [D]grace has pardoned [D/F#M]our transgressions His [G2]grace so [D/F#]marvelous so [EM7]free [G]His [D]grace has paid our [BM7]debt completely His [EM7]grace is [D/F#]all we'll ever n[G2]eed [ASUS] Oh what grace
{new_page} Verse 2: [D]Once we stood before Him [D/F#]guilty Condemned by all our [G2]sin Deserving of His [ASUS]wrath But [D]God so very rich in [D/F#]mercy lavished on us [G2]grace Through His Son's atoning [ASUS]death [A] And [EM7]He has [G]saved our [ASUS]souls [A] And [EM7]of His [G]grace we'll [C2]sing
Chorus: His [D]grace has pardoned [D/F#M]our transgressions His [G2]grace so [D/F#]marvelous so [EM7]free [G]His [D]grace has paid our [BM7]debt completely His [EM7]grace is [D/F#]all we'll ever n[G2]eed [ASUS] Oh what grace
Bridge: [EM7] And we could never [D/F#]add To the finished work of [G2]Christ It will always be [ASUS]enough [A] [EM7] So it's here we'll rest our h[D/F#]earts And it's here we'll find our [G2]peace In His perfect righteous[ASUS]ness [A]
Tag: [E#m7 D/F# G2 A B]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 come and let us lift our voices let us sing anew of his redeeming grace come with hearts so full of wonder let us shout for joy for hes washed our sins away yes he has saved our souls and of his grace well sing chorus his grace has pardoned our transgressions his grace so marvelous so free his grace has paid our debt completely his grace is all well ever need oh what grace verse 2 once we stood before him guilty condemned by all our sin deserving of his wrath but god so very rich in mercy lavished on us grace through his sons atoning death and he has saved our souls and of his grace well sing chorus his grace has pardoned our transgressions his grace so marvelous so free his grace has paid our debt completely his grace is all well ever need oh what grace bridge and we could never add to the finished work of christ it will always be enough so its here well rest our hearts and its here well find our peace in his perfect righteousness tag
